languages.text: "Напрасно, элантах, ведь я могу о себе позаботиться... Впрочем, судя по выражению твоего лица, моя медитация привела тебя в замешательство — но только от незнания".

traits.locale_text: [драфт] Медитация — это уход в себя, в свой внутренний мир, чтобы поговорить с самим собой, но без слов. Сложно объяснить? Да уж, это можно только показать.
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "You needn't have been, elantach, for I can take care of myself. However, judging by your expression, my meditation has distressed you — but only due to your ignorance."
languages.original_text: "Напрасно, элантах, ведь я могу о себе позаботиться... Впрочем, судя по выражению твоего лица, моя медитация привела тебя в замешательство — но только от незнания".

traits.locale_text: "You needn't have been, elantach, for I can take care of myself. However, judging by your expression, my meditation has distressed you — but only due to your ignorance."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You needn't have been, elantach, for I can take care of myself. However, judging by your expression, my meditation has distressed you — but only due to your ignorance."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No tenías necesidad, elantach, pues sé cuidar de mí misma. No obstante, a juzgar por tu expresión, mi meditación te ha inquietado; si bien eso se debe únicamente a tu ignorancia».
languages.original_text: "You needn't have been, elantach, for I can take care of myself. However, judging by your expression, my meditation has distressed you — but only due to your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: «No tenías necesidad, elantach, pues sé cuidar de mí misma. No obstante, a juzgar por tu expresión, mi meditación te ha inquietado; si bien eso se debe únicamente a tu ignorancia».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「心配ない、エランタ。自分の面倒は自分で見られる。だが、その表情を見るかぎり、我の瞑想のせいでずいぶん動揺させてしまったようだが…それはひとえに、お前が無知だからだ」
languages.original_text: "You needn't have been, elantach, for I can take care of myself. However, judging by your expression, my meditation has distressed you — but only due to your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: 「心配ない、エランタ。自分の面倒は自分で見られる。だが、その表情を見るかぎり、我の瞑想のせいでずいぶん動揺させてしまったようだが…それはひとえに、お前が無知だからだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你不必担心，外界人，我能照顾好自己。从你的表情来看，我的沉思让你感到忧虑不已，但这种忧虑仅仅由于你的无知罢了。”
languages.original_text: "You needn't have been, elantach, for I can take care of myself. However, judging by your expression, my meditation has distressed you — but only due to your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: “你不必担心，外界人，我能照顾好自己。从你的表情来看，我的沉思让你感到忧虑不已，但这种忧虑仅仅由于你的无知罢了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « C'était inutile, elantach, je peux prendre soin de moi. À en juger par votre expression, ma méditation semble vous avoir {mf|troublé|troublée}... mais seulement à cause de votre ignorance. »
languages.original_text: "You needn't have been, elantach, for I can take care of myself. However, judging by your expression, my meditation has distressed you — but only due to your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: « C'était inutile, elantach, je peux prendre soin de moi. À en juger par votre expression, ma méditation semble vous avoir {mf|troublé|troublée}... mais seulement à cause de votre ignorance. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Das wäre nicht nötig gewesen, Elantach, ich kann selbst auf mich aufpassen. Aber Eurer Miene nach zu urteilen, hat meine Meditation Euch beunruhigt ... wenn auch nur aufgrund Eurer Ignoranz."
languages.original_text: "You needn't have been, elantach, for I can take care of myself. However, judging by your expression, my meditation has distressed you — but only due to your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: "Das wäre nicht nötig gewesen, Elantach, ich kann selbst auf mich aufpassen. Aber Eurer Miene nach zu urteilen, hat meine Meditation Euch beunruhigt ... wenn auch nur aufgrund Eurer Ignoranz."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "You needn't have been, elantach, for I can take care of myself. However, judging by your expression, my meditation has distressed you — but only due to your ignorance."

languages.text: "Endişelenmene gerek yoktu elantach. Kendi başımın çaresine bakabilirim. Ancak yüz ifadene bakınca meditasyonumun seni rahatsız ettiğini görüyorum. Bilgisizliğinden böyle olsa gerek."
languages.original_text: "You needn't have been, elantach, for I can take care of myself. However, judging by your expression, my meditation has distressed you — but only due to your ignorance."

traits.locale_text: "Endişelenmene gerek yoktu elantach. Kendi başımın çaresine bakabilirim. Ancak yüz ifadene bakınca meditasyonumun seni rahatsız ettiğini görüyorum. Tabii ki sadece bilgisizliğinden böyle olsa gerek."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
